__data__.text:
Guides & Tutorials

Welcome to the Blues guide & tutorial hub. Here you'll find informational guides for learning about Blues hardware and cloud services, and hands-on tutorials that walk you through connecting and using Blues hardware step-by-step.

Collecting Sensor Data: A hands-on tutorial that walks you through collecting sensor data and sending it to Notehub. The tutorial supports a wide variety of programming languages, microcontrollers, and single-board computers.

Routing Data to Cloud: A hands-on tutorial that guides you through securely forwarding your Notehub data to a variety of cloud providers and IoT platforms to build engaging cloud-based dashboards.

Building Edge ML Applications: A hands-on tutorial that walks you through creating an Edge ML application, including building your own ML model from scratch.

Twilio SMS Guide: Learn how to send SMS messages using Twilio via a Notehub route.

Fleet Admin Guide: Dive into Notehub to discover features that allow you to inspect transferred data, manage device fleets, and perform cloud-based OTA DFU.

Using the Notehub API: A short tutorial on how to use the Notehub API to manage your projects.

Notecard Guides: A series of guides to help you use different features of the Notecard.

Can we improve this page? Send us feedback
